author: m0_ox
content: I released a new [bal@v1.7.0](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/bal%40v1.7.0) with a fix to track the address in a contract init collision case. As always, make sure to flag anything here that looks off with the spec and we will keep updating.
